txt.en: As the unrelenting forces of Ungol pour from the mountain, few Orcs remain in Lhingris.
You have successfully gathered much silk from the valley of Lhingris.

A notice is posted on the board. It sounds urgent:

'Spider silk can be found in Lhingris. A brave adventurer is needed to gather silk from deadly valley. Seek out Candúr in Udûn to learn more.'

<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires  Kála-murg: The Final Stand to be underway. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter this instance in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
Candúr can be found in Udûn.\n\nYou should talk Candúr.
